stages.name: Beggar
stages.intro: You wake on a cobbled side street, dazed in old clothes and no possessions

stages.name: Lumberjack
stages.intro: A local craftsman is paying well for wood, this is an oppertunity to make some money

stages.name: Miner
stages.intro: Miners always seem to have more money, lets give that a go.

stages.name: Blacksmith
stages.intro: The local blacksmith is awful, i could do much better

stages.name: Salesman
stages.intro: This is tiring work, i need something less physical
